official_title: To provide separate subheadings in the Harmonized Tariff Schedules of the United States for certain gloves, mittens and mitts, specially designed for use in sports.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide separate subheadings in such Schedule for certain gloves, mittens, and mitts designed for use in sports.

titles.title: To provide separate subheadings in the Harmonized Tariff Schedules of the United States for certain gloves, mittens and mitts, specially designed for use in sports.
